CloseWindow - class CloseWindow.
CloseWindow lets you close the window

cursor - Variable in class Key
 

K

Key - class Key.
Modified by Mike Norton, 11/03/03, 11/05/03, 11/10/03.
Functional Purpose: Displays a key pressed by the user, 11/05/03; and deal with new lines.
Key(String, String[]) - Constructor for class Key
Key constructs the Key object by passing the title to the frame, setting the passed font, and setting up the window in general.
keyPressed(KeyEvent) - Method in class Key
 
keyReleased(KeyEvent) - Method in class Key
 
keyTyped(KeyEvent) - Method in class Key
keyTyped adds the new key to the string of keys to be displayed, 11/05/03 if it is a printable character

M

m - Variable in class Key
 
main(String[]) - Static method in class Key
main declares a new Key object, sets the window size, and displays the Key object.

P

p - Variable in class Key
 
paint(Graphics) - Method in class Key
paint writes the characters in the "s" string to the screen, one at a time so they are editable later.

s - Variable in class Key
